settings.faq_question: ARE YOUR PRODUCTS VEGAN? PARABEN-FREE? CRUELTY-FREE?
settings.faq_answer:
Yes, yes, and yes! Our line is 100% vegan, baby!

Parabens are a ‚Äòhell no‚Äô for us. We use the best possible ingredients in our products, including vegan flavoring and natural oils, and thoughtful formulation with minimal to no preservatives.

All of our products are cruelty-free! We do not test our products or ingredients on animals. We wouldn‚Äôt dare test any of our products on our furry friends and we are not affiliated with any other beauty company or suppliers that test on animals. We‚Äôre officially Leaping Bunny Certified. settings.faq_question: HOW DO YOU SUGGEST APPLYING YOUR PRODUCTS?
settings.faq_answer:
We suggest using our lip products without lip balm as a base for all of our products. Our team worked on these formulas for years to ensure our products included the perfect amount of restoring ingredients to keep your skin moisturized throughout the day. Please note that because our Cake Batter is filled with moisturizing agents, the product will not dry down all of the way, as it's a creme-matte formula!

Don‚Äôt have a liner to apply our Cake Batter? No worries! We picked a specific doe-foot applicator to make sure our customers, regardless of lip size, could easily get in the corners and line their lips for the perfect pout!
